code: @Test public void testPropertyEditorTypeConverter() throws Exception {     // test that converters a custom object (MyBean) to a String which causes     // PropertyEditorTypeConverter to be used. And this test times how fast     // this is. As we want to optimize PropertyEditorTypeConverter to be faster     MyBean bean = new MyBean().     bean.setBar("Hello").     StopWatch watch = new StopWatch().     for (int i = 0. i < 500. i++) {         String s = context.getTypeConverter().convertTo(String.class, bean).         log.debug(s).         assertNotNull(s).     }     log.info("Time taken: " + watch.taken()). }
